ygData.subject: RE: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I raised those DEs from Dubious to Amiable, so they have some faction. Talies the smart shopper
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:16 PM 9/22/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>> example, in west commons with a dubious merchant, i was able to sing and get
>> the merchant to indifferent and sell to me. in oasis at the inn, i was
>> unable to sing but with a flute i could get the merchant to indifferent.
>> however, in south ro with singing and with a flute, i can not raise the dark
>> elf merchants at all, they remain dubious. so maybe it depends on how
>
>It also depends on whether or not your target even has a
>faction. If it has no faction, there's no way to raise it,
>and the song will have no effect.

I raised those DEs from Dubious to Amiable, so they have some faction.

Talies the smart shopper
